channel.title: Posts on Sean's Shitposting

item.title: Reading Books Again
item.description: I’ve been reading the Thrawn trilogy along with A More Civilized Age and have been really enjoying it. It’s spurred me into reading again. I hadn’t finished a prose book in over two and a half years and this year I’ll have read 3 in the last three months. I hope I’m able to keep this up, even if it’s not at this pace. Planning on reading The Books of Earthsea after and follow along with Shelved by Genre on that on. Making it homework seems to be helping right now.
